title: What do you want me to do?
body:
Everytime I get into a series, someone afks or trolls or even inted just like my last game for series.

And this happens EVERYTIME I get into series. Lose 2 in a row no matter what.
I can understand the chat restrict for flaming the afks and inting people but, I dont see them punished. In fact, I call bullshit for chat restricting when I get elo punished for trying my best.
I dont understand what's the incentive here for being good player if I get punished for no reason.

Now I lose close to 19LP when I used to lose 13LP after losing 4 series straight.

So RIOT, what the FUCK do you want me to do?
Play nice or pat people on the back?

replies.body: Even though you aren't seeing the people you report getting punished, that doesn't necessarily mean it's alright to start flaming or inting like you mentioned. At the end of the day, it feels a lot better to report someone and still be able to play as opposed to fighting back for your honor and ending up not being able to play =\ .

At the end of the day, it feels a lot better to report someone and still be able to play as opposed to fighting back for your honor and ending up not being able to play =\ .

Then literally explain why people like 0/7/0 singed who ints in my team ALWAYS appear in my fucking series. LOOK at all record where I lose 2 games straight whenever I get into series.

And I get taxed and punished heavier every time i play series. And in my last series, the whole team trolled me since they knew I was in series. So just take it in my ass and say gg for shit games? 

Fucking please. Where is the sportsmanship in that?
